title: Portsmouth Centenary Tournament
text:
The Portsmouth Centenary Tournament was an invitational <a href="Association%20football">football</a> tournament to celebrate the centenary of <a href="Portsmouth%20F.C.">Portsmouth FC</a> at <a href="Fratton%20Park">Fratton Park</a>, <a href="Portsmouth">Portsmouth</a>. The only edition took place between 1 and 2 August 1998. It was contested by four teams.
Tournament.
Source:
Bracket.
<br>
